verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me unto the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, which <S%H6437>looketh<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>: and <S%H6607>behold<s%>, at the door of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>; and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azzur<s%>, and <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, these are the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, and that <S%H3289>give<s%> <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>;
that <S%H559>say<s%>, The time is not <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>: this city is the <S%H5518>caldron<s%>, and we are the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against <S%H5012>them<s%>, prophesy, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H559>me<s%>, and he said unto <S%H559>me<s%>, Speak, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Thus have ye <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for I <S%H3045>know<s%> the things that <S%H4609>come<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind<s%>.
Ye have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and ye have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H2351>streets<s%> thereof with the <S%H2491>slain<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Your <S%H2491>slain<s%> whom ye have <S%H7760>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1320>it<s%>, they are the flesh, and this city is the <S%H5518>caldron<s%>; but ye shall be brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the midst of <S%H8432>it<s%>.
Ye have <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon <S%H5002>you<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will bring you forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, and deliver you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%>, and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> judgments among <S%H8201>you<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

This city shall not be your <S%H5518>caldron<s%>, neither shall ye be the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H8199>thereof<s%>; I will judge you in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: for ye have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, neither have ye <S%H6213>executed<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, but have <S%H6213>done<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round about <S%H5439>you<s%>.

And it came to <S%H5012>pass<s%>, when I prophesied, that <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>. Then fell I <S%H5307>down<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>! wilt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, even thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> of thy <S%H1353>kindred<s%>, and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all of <S%H3427>them<s%>, are they unto whom the inhabitants of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have <S%H559>said<s%>, Get you <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; unto us is this <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> for a <S%H4181>possession<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Whereas I have removed them far <S%H7368>off<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and whereas I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries<s%>, yet will I be to them a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for a <S%H4592>little<s%> while in the <S%H776>countries<s%> where they are <S%H935>come<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and <S%H622>assemble<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> where ye have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5493>thither<s%>, and they shall take away all the detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> thereof and all the abominations thereof from <S%H8441>thence<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>; and I will take the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>;

that they may <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>: and they shall be my people, and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>.

But as for them whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> after the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> upon their own <S%H7218>heads<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

Then did the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H3519>them<s%>; and the glory of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was over them <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> which is on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4758>vision<s%> by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>, to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>. So the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> went up from <S%H5927>me<s%>.
Then I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had showed <S%H7200>me<s%>.
